mapper.select:
SELECT t.`pro_id` AS proId ,t.`pro_no` AS proNo ,t.`pro_name` AS proName ,t.`pro_where` AS proWhere ,t.`pro_org` AS proOrg ,t.`pro_type` AS proType ,t.`pro_address` AS proAddress ,t.`pro_scope` AS scope FROM tb_project t where 1=1
AND (t.`pro_name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{proName},'%') OR t.`pro_org` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{proName},'%'))
AND t.`pro_type` = #{proType}
AND t.`pro_where` LIKE CONCAT(#{area},'%')
ORDER BY t.`pro_no` DESC

SELECT t.`pro_id` AS proId ,t.`pro_no` AS proNo ,t.`pro_name` AS proName ,t.`pro_where` AS proWhere ,t.`pro_type` AS proType ,t.`pro_address` AS proAddress ,t2.`b_org` AS proOrg t3.`super_org` AS proOrg t4.`explore_org` AS proOrg t5.`design_org` AS proOrg FROM tb_project t
LEFT JOIN mishu.`tb_project_build` t2 ON t2.`pro_id` = t.`pro_id`
AND t2.`b_org` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{proOrg},'%')
LEFT JOIN mishu.`tb_project_supervision` t3 ON t3.`pro_id` = t.`pro_id`
AND t3.`super_org` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{proOrg},'%')
LEFT JOIN mishu.`tb_project_design` t4 ON t4.`pro_id` = t.`pro_id`
AND t4.`explore_org` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{proOrg},'%')
LEFT JOIN mishu.`tb_project_design` t5 ON t5.`pro_id` = t.`pro_id`
AND t5.`design_org` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{proOrg},'%')
WHERE 1=1
AND t.`pro_name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{proName},'%')
AND t.`pro_type` = #{proType}
AND t.`pro_where` LIKE CONCAT(#{area},'%')
select name,path from area where grade=0 order by name_abbr

SELECT t.pro_id AS proId ,t.`xmid` AS xmlid ,t.`pro_name` AS proName ,t.`pro_no` AS proNo ,t.`project_no` AS projectNo ,t.`pro_org` AS proOrg ,t.`pro_where` AS proWhere ,t.`pro_address` AS proAddress ,t.`invest_amount` AS investAmount ,t.`approval_num` AS approvalNum ,t.`pro_type` AS proType ,t.`build_type` AS buildType ,t.`acreage` AS acreage ,t.`pro_scope` AS proScope ,t.`land_licence` AS landLicence ,t.`plan_licence` AS planLicence ,t.`pro_level` AS proLevel ,t.`pro_use` AS proUse ,t3.`org_code` AS orgCode ,t1.`complete_date` AS completeDate FROM tb_project t LEFT JOIN tb_company t3 ON t.`pro_org` = t3.`com_name` LEFT JOIN tb_project_build t1 ON t.`pro_id` = t1.`pro_id` WHERE t.`pro_id` = #{proId} order by t1.`complete_date` desc limit 1
